cu.explanation_en: Setting the remote SCTP control port to 0 (invalid port) will cause SCTP socket connection failure, preventing F1-C connection establishment between CU and DU.

du.explanation_en: Setting the remote N control port to 0 (invalid port) will cause SCTP socket connection failure, preventing F1-C connection establishment between DU and CU.
du.explanation_zh: 將遠端 N 控制端口設定為 0（無效端口）會導致 SCTP 套接字連接失敗，防止 DU 與 CU 之間建立 F1-C 連接。
